title: Sandra21
author: Sandra21
content: For better results we need to take all the security measures that ensure privacy and security. We have to be very vigilant and careful while selecting a project in crytpo. All the important security issues should be resolved in a project. Due to scam, hacking and illegal activities there is trust cruise all over crypto but there is hope even in the darkest days. There is a project a got to know a couple of days a ago that has satisfied me as far as security and profit is concerned. It offering less fee and high speed with that it has incorporated all the security measures in it. For me project should be evaluated through three major factors first audit and kyc , Road map and live features. Oscar swap has great long term plan and amazing new things that will be done in future not only that it has 3 live features mobile app , farming and staking. All and above it has been audited from one of the eminent organization solid proof and it has done KYC as well. So in the end I came to conclusion that my investments will be secured with oscarswap and it will surely give me great returns.
